programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Drama, Crime/detective, History, Thriller ║ 2012 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action thriller based on a true story, starring Jessica Chastain. After the 9/11 terrorist attacks, the hunt for al-Qaeda leader Osama Bin Laden intensifies and pressure grows on CIA agent Maya and her colleagues to bring him to justice. programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. programme.title: Last Train to Christmas
programme.desc: Tony Towers, a successful nightclub manager and local celebrity, embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion in 1985, but things soon get a little strange. Moving up a carriage to the buffet car lands him in 1995, where he finds his clubs have failed and his life has fallen apart. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. programme.title: The Taming of the Shrew
programme.desc: Shakespeare's battle-of-the-sexes comedy starring Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor. programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Crime/detective, Family, Sci Fi, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Turtle brothers Donatello, Leonardo, Michelangelo and Raphael have been raised in the sewers of New York by their mentor Splinter. programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. programme.title: ATP Final: Washington
programme.desc: A winner is crowned at the ATP 500 in Washington, as USA's Sebastian Korda plays Flavio Cobolli - who knocked out number two seed Ben Shelton in the semi-finals. (04.08).

programme.title: WTA Final: Charleston
programme.desc: The final of the 2024 Credit One Charleston Open, a WTA 500 tournament held in South Carolina. (07.04).

programme.title: ATP Final: Barcelona
programme.desc: In a rematch of the Monte-Carlo Masters final, Stefanos Tsitsipas and Casper Ruud meet again to decide the Barcelona Open winner. Tsitsipas boasts a 10-0 record on clay this season. (21.04).

programme.title: WTA Final: Stuttgart
programme.desc: In the final of the Porsche Tennis Grand Prix, Elena Rybakina meets Marta Kostyuk. Rybakina defeated Iga Swiatek to arrive here, while Kostyuk knocked off Marketa Vondrousova. (21.04).

programme.title: ATP Final: Halle
programme.desc: The men's singles final at the Terra Wortmann Open in Halle, Germany - an ATP 500 grass-court event won on 10 separate occasions by the legendary Roger Federer. (16.06).

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tennis 2024 Season Review
programme.desc: A joint review of the ATP and WTA Tour seasons.

programme.title: WTA Final: Doha
programme.desc: Competing in her third final of 2024, the number three seed Elena Rybakina attempts to dethrone the two-time defending champion here at WTA Doha - world number one Iga Swiatek. (17.02).

programme.title: WTA Final: Dubai
programme.desc: The Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships concludes with the women's singles final. Barbora Krejcikova was this year's reigning champion. (24.02).

programme.title: WTA Finals: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Indian Wells witnesses the women's singles final between world number one Iga Swiatek and Greece's Maria Sakkari. Who will come out on top in this repeat of the 2022 final? (17.03).

programme.title: ATP Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: At Indian Wells, defending champion Carlos Alcaraz looks to reclaim his title as he meets Daniil Medvedev in the men's singles final - who was the runner-up last year. (17.03).

programme.title: WTA Final: Miami
programme.desc: The women's singles final of the 2024 Miami Open - a WTA 1000 event - as home favourite Danielle Collins takes on world number four Elena Rybakina. (30.03).

programme.title: ATP Final: Miami
programme.desc: The men's singles final of the 2024 Miami Open - an ATP Masters 1000 event. (31.03).

programme.title: ATP Final: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: After upset wins in the semi-finals, Stefanos Tsitsipas and Casper Ruud meet in the Monte-Carlo final. Tsitsipas is a two-time champion, while Ruud targets his first 1000 title. (14.04).

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion. (04.05).

programme.title: ATP Final: Madrid
programme.desc: A men's singles champion is crowned in the Spanish capital, as the world number eight Andrey Rublev faces Felix Auger-Aliassime, who appears in his first Masters 1000 final. (05.05).

programme.title: WTA Final: Rome
programme.desc: Two weeks on from an electric final in Madrid, Iga Swiatek and Aryna Sabalenka go again as the world number one meets the number two in the Internazionali BNL d'Italia title match. (18.05).

programme.title: ATP Final: Rome
programme.desc: The men's singles final in Rome is set, with Alexander Zverev facing Chile's Nicolas Jarry. A champion here in 2017, victory for Zverev would see him climb to world number four. (19.05).

programme.title: ATP Final: Montreal
programme.desc: Andrey Rublev competes in his sixth ATP Masters 1000 final, as the world number six faces a player appearing in his first, Alexei Popyrin. Who will be crowned Montreal champion? (12.08).

programme.title: WTA Final: Toronto
programme.desc: Defending champion Jessica Pegula meets Amanda Anisimova in an all-American Toronto final. Anisimova enters the contest as the lowest-ranked finalist of the past four decades. (12.08).

programme.title: WTA Final: Cincinnati
programme.desc: Jessica Pegula, a champion in Canada a week ago, sets out to extend Aryna Sabalenka's six-month title drought as the pair collide in the Cincinnati Open final. (19.08).

programme.title: ATP Final: Cincinnati
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner faces Frances Tiafoe in the American's first ATP Masters 1000 final, as the fan favourite attempts to topple the Italian world number one at the Cincinnati Open. (19.08).

programme.title: US Open Men's Final
programme.desc: In the men's singles final, Jannik Sinner stands in the way of Taylor Fritz and history, as the home hope looks to end a 21-year wait for an American man to win a Grand Slam title. (08.09).

programme.title: US Open Women's Final
programme.desc: New York's own Jessica Pegula - competing in her first Grand Slam final - takes on last year's runner-up Aryna Sabalenka, as a first-time winner of the US Open is crowned on Ashe. (07.09).

programme.title: WTA Final: Beijing
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned at the 2024 China Open, as fourth seed Coco Gauff takes on Karolina Muchova, who beat Qinwen Zheng previously. (06.10).

programme.title: ATP Final: Shanghai
programme.desc: A review of the Rolex Shanghai Masters, an ATP 1000 event held in China.

programme.title: WTA Final: Wuhan
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned at the Wuhan Open, a WTA 1000 event held in China. (13.10).

programme.title: ATP Final: Paris
programme.desc: The number three seed Alexander Zverev of Germany stands between Frenchman Ugo Humbert and a seventh tour-level title, as the two contest the final of the Paris Masters. (03.11).

programme.title: WTA Finals: Riyadh Final
programme.desc: At the WTA Finals in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, a women's singles champion is crowned. (09.11).

programme.title: ATP Finals: Turin Final
programme.desc: A men's singles champion is crowned as world number one Jannik Sinner faces familiar foe American Taylor Fritz at the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals. (17.11).

programme.title: ATP Final: Next Gen
programme.desc: A singles champion is crowned at the Next Gen ATP Finals, held in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. Previous winners of this event include Grand Slam winners Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz. (22.12).

programme.title: US Open '24: Evans v Khachanov
programme.desc: Dan Evans' third-round run at the 2024 US Open began with an epic five-set thriller against Karen Khachanov, who two years prior, appeared in the semi-finals of the New York Slam.

programme.title: US Open '24: Paolini v Andreescu
programme.desc: Jasmine Paolini entered the 2024 US Open a Roland Garros and Wimbledon finalist in the same season, as the Italian got underway in New York against former champion Bianca Andreescu.

programme.title: US Open '24: Tiafoe v Shelton
programme.desc: During a memorable US Open run for Frances Tiafoe, the big-hitting American would reconvene with compatriot Ben Shelton in round three - a year on from their 2023 quarter-final meeting.

programme.title: US Open '24: Zheng v Vekic
programme.desc: During the 2024 US Open, Arthur Ashe Stadium was treated to an Olympic final rematch, as Qinwen Zheng and Donna Vekic went toe to toe at the last-16 stage of the New York Grand Slam.

programme.title: US Open '24: Dimitrov v Rublev
programme.desc: Without dropping a set, Grigor Dimitrov arrived at the last-16 of the 2024 US Open where the veteran Bulgarian would stand across the net from a sixth-seeded Andrey Rublev.

programme.title: US Open '24: Navarro v Gauff
programme.desc: In defence of her 2023 US Open women's singles crown, Coco Gauff was tasked with a last-16 match-up against an in-form Emma Navarro who had steamed through the earlier rounds.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Spurs v United '96
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 1996 and a memorable match between Tottenham and Manchester United at White Hart Lane.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Spurs v ManU '01
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2001 and a thrilling eight-goal encounter between Tottenham and Man Utd at White Hart Lane.

programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2012 and a thrilling five-goal game between Man Utd and Tottenham Hotspur at Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Spurs v United '17
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, a look back to 2017 and a clash between Tottenham Hotspur and Manchester United in Spurs' final game at White Hart Lane.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 96/97
programme.desc: Sky Sports takes a look at some of the best goals from Premier League seasons in years gone by. Here, enjoy some of the finest strikes from the 1996-97 campaign.

programme.title: Best PL Goals: Chelsea v Arsenal
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the finest goals from matches between London rivals Chelsea and Arsenal.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Didier Drogba
programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Barclays Premier League history. This episode features the best of Didier Drogba's 100 top-flight goals.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:ManU v Spurs '09
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, a look back to 2009 and a seven-goal thriller between Manchester United and Spurs at Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Spurs v ManU '98
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, a look back to 1998 and a four-goal thriller between Spurs and Man Utd at White Hart Lane.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:ManU v Spurs 99
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 1999 as Manchester United looked to secure the Premier League title against Tottenham Hotspur.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:United v Arsenal
programme.desc: A look back at some great matches from the top flight. Here, a look back at a classic Premier League clash between Man Utd and Arsenal at Old Trafford in 2002.

programme.title: Transfer 360: Nemanja Vidic
programme.desc: The inside story of Nemanja Vidic's move to Manchester United. Hear from Vidic as well as Edwin van der Sar and Patrice Evra on how one of the greatest defenders started his journey.

programme.title: Fantasy Football Christmas Special
programme.desc: Join Fantasy Premier League experts for all the usual tips and advice in this festive special ahead of a packed Boxing Day of fixtures.

programme.title: PL 30: Ferguson's First Title
programme.desc: Steve Bruce's brace against Sheffield Wednesday sets Manchester United on the way to their maiden Premier League title.

programme.title: PL 30: The House That Jack Built
programme.desc: During the 1994-1995 campaign, Blackburn Rovers wrote their name into the history books, as Alan Shearer's 34 goals steered the Ewood Park outfit towards Premier League immortality.

programme.title: PL 30: The Game Of The Century
programme.desc: Revisit Liverpool and Newcastle's meeting at Anfield in April 1996, one that epitomises the Premier League, as Collymore's stoppage time winner capped off a frantic end-to-end encounter.

programme.title: PL 30: Bergkamp's Wonder Goal
programme.desc: Brought to England's top flight by Bruce Rioch, Dennis Bergkamp graced the Premier League for 11 seasons and produced moment after moment, including this one against Newcastle.

programme.title: PL 30: The Invincibles
programme.desc: The crowning glory in Arsene Wenger's storied Arsenal career - the season he guided the men from Highbury to an entire season unbeaten, as the 03-04 campaign became one to remember.

programme.title: Genesis Invitational 2024 Hlts

programme.title: Memorial Tournament 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the PGA Tour's Memorial Tournament, held at Muirfield Village Golf Club in Dublin, Ohio. 2023 winner Viktor Hovland returns to defend the title.

programme.title: St Jude Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 St Jude Championship, held at TPC Southwind. This tournament marked the start of the three-event FedEx Cup Playoffs, a season-long PGA Tour prize.

programme.title: BMW Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the BMW Championship, held Castle Pines Golf Club. This is the second event of the FedEx Cup Playoffs and features a progressive cut as 50 stars compete.

programme.title: PGA Tour Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the TOUR Championship at East Lake Golf Club, as the top 30 players on the PGA Tour vie for FedEx Cup glory. (01.09).

programme.title: LET Open De Espana 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Ladies European Tour's season finale - the Andalucia Costa Del Sol Open de Espana, held at Real Club Guadalhorce Golf.

programme.title: LPGA Tour Championship 2024
programme.desc: Action from the final round of the 2024 CME Group Tour Championship at Tiburón Golf Club. Jeeno Thitikul and Angel Yin lead the way in the race for the $4 million winner's prize. (24.11).

programme.title: The Players Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the Players Championship, taking place at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida. Who will follow Scottie Scheffler to scoop the PGA Tour's richest prize in 2024? (17.03).

programme.title: Masters 2024 Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The unflappable Scottie Scheffler leads heading into Masters Sunday at Augusta National with Collin Morikawa, Max Homa and first-timer Ludvig Aberg all in striking distance. (14.04).

programme.title: Chevron Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The final day of play at the Chevron Championship, held at the Club at Carlton Woods. Canadian superstar Brooke Henderson and Nelly Korda are among the names in contention. (21.04).

programme.title: PGA Championship 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: The final round of the PGA Championship at Valhalla. Xander Schauffele and Collin Morikawa share the lead with Shane Lowry well within striking distance after Saturday's 9-under 62. (19.05).

programme.title: Women's U.S. Open 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Action from day four of the 79th US Women's Open in Pennsylvania. 2022 winner Minjee Lee held a share of the lead at five-under going into the final round after a strong third day. (02.06).

programme.title: U.S. Open 2024 Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The final round from Pinehurst at the US Open. Bryson DeChambeau is in pole position to secure his second Major as Rory McIlroy leads a trio of challengers within striking distance. (16.06).

programme.title: Women's PGA Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth round of the third women's Major of the year, as Sahalee Country Club in Washington stages the KPMG Women's PGA Championship. China's Ruoning Yin is the current holder. (23.06).

programme.title: Evian Championship 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: The final day of the Amundi Evian Championship held at Évian-les-Bains' Resort Golf Club. The French crowds witnessed countrywoman Celine Boutier clinch Major victory here in 2023. (14.07).

programme.title: The Open Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The final round of The 152nd Open at Royal Troon. Six players, including Justin Rose and Dan Brown, sit one back from leader Billy Horschel, who seeks his Major breakthrough. (21.07).

programme.title: Women's Open 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: On day four of the AIG Women's Open, England's Charley Hull has ground to make up, with Jiyai Shin leading from Lilia Vu and Nelly Korda heading into the final round at St Andrews. (25.08).

programme.title: Solheim Cup 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: On the final day of the Solheim Cup, Robert Trent Jones Golf Club is set for a thrilling finale. Team Europe look to mount a comeback as they trail USA 10-6 ahead of the singles. (15.09).

programme.title: Presidents Cup 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Presidents Cup, as Mike Weir led International Team into battle with Jim Furyk's US Team.

programme.title: Dubai Desert Classic 2024 Hlts

programme.title: Scottish Open 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the 2024 Genesis Scottish Open - the next Rolex Series event on the DP World Tour calendar. Rory McIlroy defends the the title at Renaissance Club. (14.07).

programme.title: DP World Tour C'Ship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the DP World Tour Championship - the final event of the 2024 season - held on Jumeirah Golf Estates' Earth Course in Dubai. (17.11).

programme.title: Genesis Invitational 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Genesis Invitational - the third PGA Tour Signature Event of 2024 - at Riviera Country Club in California. Jon Rahm claimed victory here previously.

programme.title: Memorial Tournament 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the PGA Tour's Memorial Tournament, held at Muirfield Village Golf Club in Dublin, Ohio. 2023 winner Viktor Hovland returns to defend the title.

programme.title: St Jude Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 St Jude Championship, held at TPC Southwind. This tournament marked the start of the three-event FedEx Cup Playoffs, a season-long PGA Tour prize.

programme.title: BMW Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the BMW Championship, held Castle Pines Golf Club. This is the second event of the FedEx Cup Playoffs and features a progressive cut as 50 stars compete.

programme.title: PGA Tour Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the TOUR Championship at East Lake Golf Club, as the top 30 players on the PGA Tour vie for FedEx Cup glory. (01.09).

programme.title: LET Open De Espana 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Ladies European Tour's season finale - the Andalucia Costa Del Sol Open de Espana, held at Real Club Guadalhorce Golf.

programme.title: LPGA Tour Championship 2024
programme.desc: Action from the final round of the 2024 CME Group Tour Championship at Tiburón Golf Club. Jeeno Thitikul and Angel Yin lead the way in the race for the $4 million winner's prize. (24.11).

programme.title: The Players Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the Players Championship, taking place at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida. Who will follow Scottie Scheffler to scoop the PGA Tour's richest prize in 2024? (17.03).

programme.title: Masters 2024 Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The unflappable Scottie Scheffler leads heading into Masters Sunday at Augusta National with Collin Morikawa, Max Homa and first-timer Ludvig Aberg all in striking distance. (14.04).

programme.title: Chevron Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The final day of play at the Chevron Championship, held at the Club at Carlton Woods. Canadian superstar Brooke Henderson and Nelly Korda are among the names in contention. (21.04).

programme.title: PGA Championship 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: The final round of the PGA Championship at Valhalla. Xander Schauffele and Collin Morikawa share the lead with Shane Lowry well within striking distance after Saturday's 9-under 62. (19.05).

programme.title: Women's U.S. Open 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Action from day four of the 79th US Women's Open in Pennsylvania. 2022 winner Minjee Lee held a share of the lead at five-under going into the final round after a strong third day. (02.06).

programme.title: U.S. Open 2024 Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The final round from Pinehurst at the US Open. Bryson DeChambeau is in pole position to secure his second Major as Rory McIlroy leads a trio of challengers within striking distance. (16.06).

programme.title: Women's PGA Championship 2024 Hlts

programme.desc: Ronaldo, Jose Mourinho, Pep Guardiola. Sports documentary.
